fields.name: Web crawler user agent
fields.description: The user agent header used when CoPED sends HTTP requests to external APIs. You may wish to add a contact email to this user agent string as a courtesy to external API providers.
fields.value: CoPEDbot/0.1 (Catalogue of Projects on Energy Data)

fields.name: Subject score threshold
fields.description: A threshold value for determining when a subject label can be applied to the project text "with confidence". This is subjective and liable to differ depending on how much project text is available. Adjust if there are too many false positives and/or too many false negatives.

fields.name: Google Analytics ID
fields.description: ID code used by Google Analytics for website engagement tracking. Set one up at: https://analytics.google.com/analytics/

fields.name: Site HTTP protocol
fields.description: Is the site being served over HTTPS (production) or HTTP (development)? Change this setting accordingly to "https" or "http".

fields.name: Homepage dashboard ID
fields.description: Provide the ID of the Metabase dashboard to show on the main landing page. This is the numerical part of the URL when editing the dashboard in the Metabase UI.

fields.name: Metabase subsite path
fields.description: The path under which the Metabase UI will be accessible to users. This should be set based on the Nginx HTTP server configuration.

fields.name: Maintenance mode message
fields.description: A text or html string that will be shown on the maintenance screen when site maintenance mode is turned on.
fields.value:
CoPED is currently under construction.
Please check back soon.
